GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.10.134
GSD.description:
ipv4: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fib_multipath_use_neigh.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.134 by commit e045d672ba06e1d35bacb56374d350de0ac99066, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit a6db4494d218c2e559173661ee972e048dc04fdd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ipv4: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fib_multipath_use_neigh.
